shortdesc.ph: State of the remote audio stream.

plentry.pd: 0: The default initial state of the remote audio. This state is reported under RemoteAudioReasonLocalMuted, RemoteAudioReasonRemoteMuted, or RemoteAudioReasonRemoteOffline.
1: The local user has received the first packet of the remote audio.
2: The remote audio stream is being decoded and playing normally. This state is reported under RemoteAudioReasonNetworkRecovery, RemoteAudioReasonLocalUnmuted, or RemoteAudioReasonRemoteUnmuted.
3: The remote audio stream is frozen. This state is reported under RemoteAudioReasonNetworkCongestion.
4: Failed to play the remote audio stream. This state is reported under RemoteAudioReasonInternal.
0: Default initial state of remote audio. This state is reported under RemoteAudioReasonLocalMuted, RemoteAudioReasonRemoteMuted, or RemoteAudioReasonRemoteOffline.
1: Local user has received the first packet of remote audio.
2: Remote audio stream is decoding and playing normally. This state is reported under RemoteAudioReasonNetworkRecovery, RemoteAudioReasonLocalUnmuted, or RemoteAudioReasonRemoteUnmuted.
3: Remote audio stream is frozen. This state is reported under RemoteAudioReasonNetworkCongestion.
4: Failed to play remote audio stream. This state is reported under RemoteAudioReasonInternal.
0: The default initial state of the remote audio. This state is reported in cases of remoteAudioReasonLocalMuted, remoteAudioReasonRemoteMuted, or remoteAudioReasonRemoteOffline.
1: The local user has received the first packet of the remote audio.
2: The remote audio stream is decoding and playing normally. This state is reported in cases of remoteAudioReasonNetworkRecovery, remoteAudioReasonLocalUnmuted, or remoteAudioReasonRemoteUnmuted.
3: The remote audio stream is frozen. This state is reported in the case of remoteAudioReasonNetworkCongestion.
4: The remote audio stream failed to play. This state is reported in the case of remoteAudioReasonInternal.
0: Default initial state of the remote audio. This state is reported under REMOTE_AUDIO_REASON_LOCAL_MUTED, REMOTE_AUDIO_REASON_REMOTE_MUTED, or REMOTE_AUDIO_REASON_REMOTE_OFFLINE.
1: The local user has received the first packet of the remote audio.
2: Remote audio stream is decoding and playing normally. This state is reported under REMOTE_AUDIO_REASON_NETWORK_RECOVERY, REMOTE_AUDIO_REASON_LOCAL_UNMUTED, or REMOTE_AUDIO_REASON_REMOTE_UNMUTED.
3: Remote audio stream is frozen. This state is reported under REMOTE_AUDIO_REASON_NETWORK_CONGESTION.
4: Remote audio stream playback failed. This state is reported under REMOTE_AUDIO_REASON_INTERNAL.
